enGB: Summon Minor Monster

This spell functions as summon monster I, except you can summon 1d3 Tiny or smaller animals, The summoned animals must all be the same type of creature. As with animals summoned with summon monster I, you apply one alignment-appropriate template to these animals.
Summon 1d3 Red Pandas
This spell functions as summon monster I, except you can summon 1d3 red pandas, As with animals summoned with summon monster I, you apply one alignment-appropriate template to these animals.
Summon 1d3 Cats
This spell functions as summon monster I, except you can summon 1d3 cats, As with animals summoned with summon monster I, you apply one alignment-appropriate template to these animals.
Summon Cacodaemon
This spell functions like summon monster, except it summons a single cacodaemon.
Summon Cacodaemon, Greater
This spell functions like summon cacodaemon, except that it summons 1d4 cacodaemons.
Summon Swarm

You summon a swarm of spiders, which attack all other creatures within its area. (You may summon the swarm so that it shares the area of other creatures.) If no living creatures are within its area, the swarm attacks or pursues the nearest creature as best it can. The caster has no control over its target or direction of travel.
Draconic Ally

You create a semi-living intelligent draconic servant that loyally obeys and serves you. Treat this servant as a pseudodragon with all of the abilities of Form of the Dragon I. They keep their breath weapon, dealing 6d8 damage depending on the type of dragon chosen.
Draconic Ally Black
Your draconic ally will cast Form of The Dragon I: Black, including their acid breath weapon.
Draconic Ally Blue
Your draconic ally will cast Form of The Dragon I: Blue, including their lightning breath weapon.
Draconic Ally Brass
Your draconic ally will cast Form of The Dragon I: Brass, including their fire breath weapon.
Draconic Ally Red
Your draconic ally will cast Form of The Dragon I: Red, including their fire breath weapon.
Draconic Ally Green
Your draconic ally will cast Form of The Dragon I: Green, including their acid breath weapon.
Draconic Ally Silver
Your draconic ally will cast Form of The Dragon I: Silver, including their cold breath weapon.
Draconic Ally White
Your draconic ally will cast Form of The Dragon I: White, including their cold breath weapon.
Summon Lesser Demon
This spell functions like summon monster, except it allows you to summon a single brimorak, one incubus, 1d3 schir demons, or 1d4 vermlek demons.
Summon Brimorak
This spell functions like summon monster, except it allows you to summon a single brimorak.
Summon Incubus
This spell functions like summon monster, except it allows you to summon a single incubus.
Summon 1d3 Schirs
This spell functions like summon monster, except it allows you to summon 1d3 schir demons.
Summon 1d4 Vermleks
This spell functions like summon monster, except it allows you to summon 1d4 vermlek demons.
